name: q5
description: A sequel to p5.js that's optimized for interactive art
author: quinton-ashley

scripts.bundle: cat src/q5-core.js src/q5-canvas.js src/q5-2d-canvas.js src/q5-2d-drawing.js src/q5-2d-image.js src/q5-2d-text.js src/q5-ai.js src/q5-color.js src/q5-display.js src/q5-input.js src/q5-math.js src/q5-sound.js src/q5-util.js src/q5-vector.js src/q5-webgpu-canvas.js src/q5-webgpu-drawing.js src/q5-webgpu-image.js src/q5-webgpu-text.js > q5.js
scripts.dist-p5play: bun dist && cp q5.js ../../web/p5play-web/v3/q5.js && cp q5.min.js ../../web/p5play-web/v3/q5.min.js
